verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph אֵ֤ל ׀ <WH410> The mighty אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> God יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [even] the LORD דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> and called אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> from the rising שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun עַד־ <WH5704> to its מְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH3996> unto the going down
מִצִּיּ֥וֹן <WH6726> Out of Zion מִכְלַל־ <WH4359> the perfection יֹ֗פִי <WH3308> of beauty אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God הוֹפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3313> hath shined

יָ֤בֹ֥א <WH935> shall come אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> Our God וְֽאַל־ <WH408> and not יֶ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <WH2790> and shall not keep silence אֵשׁ־ <WH784> a fire לְפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> before תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> shall devour וּ֝סְבִיבָ֗יו <WH5439> round about נִשְׂעֲרָ֥ה <WH8175> tempestuous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> him and it shall be very

יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> He shall call אֶל־ <WH413> about הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> to the heavens מֵעָ֑ל <WH5920> from above וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> and to the earth לָדִ֥ין <WH1777> that he may judge עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

אִסְפוּ־ <WH622> Gather לִ֥י חֲסִידָ֑י <WH2623> my saints כֹּרְתֵ֖י <WH3772> together unto me those that have made בְרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> a covenant עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> with זָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> with me by sacrifice

וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> shall declare שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> And the heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> his righteousness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֱלֹהִ֓ים ׀ <WH430> for God שֹׁפֵ֖ט <WH8199> [is] judge ה֣וּא <WH1931> Himself סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> himself Selah

שִׁמְעָ֤ה <WH8085> Hear עַמִּ֨י ׀ <WH5971> O my people וַאֲדַבֵּ֗רָה <WH1696> and I will speak יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> O Israel וְאָעִ֣ידָה <WH5749> and I will testify בָּ֑ךְ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> against thee I [am] God אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ <WH430> [even] thy God אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עַל־ <WH5921> for זְ֭בָחֶיךָ <WH2077> thee for thy sacrifices אוֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ <WH3198> I will not reprove וְעוֹלֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH5930> or thy burnt offerings לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> before תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [to have been] continually
לֹא־ <WH3808> no אֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> I will take מִבֵּיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> out of thy house פָ֑ר <WH6499> no bullock מִ֝מִּכְלְאֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4356> out of thy folds עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <WH6260> [nor] he goats

כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִ֥י כָל־ <WH3605> every חַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> For every beast יָ֑עַר <WH3293> of the forest בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <WH929> [is] mine [and] the cattle בְּהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> hills אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> upon a thousand

יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> I know כָּל־ <WH3605> every ע֣וֹף <WH5775> all the fowls הָרִ֑ים <WH2022> of the mountains וְזִ֥יז <WH2123> and the wild beasts שָׂ֝דַ֗י <WH7704> of the field עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> [are] mine

אִם־ <WH518> If אֶ֭רְעַב <WH7456> If I were hungry לֹא־ <WH3808> not אֹ֣מַר <WH559> I would not tell לָ֑ךְ כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִ֥י תֵ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> thee for the world וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃ <WH4393> [is] mine and the fulness
הַֽ֭אוֹכַל <WH398> Will I eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> the flesh אַבִּירִ֑ים <WH47> of bulls וְדַ֖ם <WH1818> the blood עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> of male אֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> or drink
זְבַ֣ח <WH2076> Offer לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> unto God תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> thanksgiving וְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> and pay לְעֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> unto the most High נְדָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5088> thy vows
וּ֭קְרָאֵנִי <WH7121> And call בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> upon me in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> of trouble אֲ֝חַלֶּצְךָ֗ <WH2502> I will deliver וּֽתְכַבְּדֵֽנִי׃ <WH3513> thee and thou shalt glorify

וְלָ֤רָשָׁ֨ע ׀ <WH7563> But unto the wicked אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> saith אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּ֭ךָ לְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> What hast thou to do to declare חֻקָּ֑י <WH2706> my statutes וַתִּשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> or [that] thou shouldest take בְרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> my covenant עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> according
וְ֭אַתָּה <WH859> you שָׂנֵ֣אתָ <WH8130> Seeing thou hatest מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> instruction וַתַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <WH7993> and castest דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> my words אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH310> behind

אִם־ <WH518> When רָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> When thou sawest גַ֭נָּב <WH1590> a thief וַתִּ֣רֶץ <WH7521> then thou consentedst עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with וְעִ֖ם <WH5973> with מְנָאֲפִ֣ים <WH5003> with adulterers חֶלְקֶֽךָ׃ <WH2506> with him and hast been partaker
פִּ֭יךָ <WH6310> thy mouth שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ <WH7971> Thou givest בְרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> to evil וּ֝לְשׁוֹנְךָ֗ <WH3956> and thy tongue תַּצְמִ֥יד <WH6775> frameth מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> deceit

תֵּ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> Thou sittest בְּאָחִ֣יךָ <WH251> against thy brother תְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> [and] speakest בְּבֶֽן־ <WH1121> son אִ֝מְּךָ֗ <WH517> thine own mother's תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> thou דֹּֽפִי׃ <WH1848> slanderest

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These עָשִׂ֨יתָ ׀ <WH6213> These [things] hast thou done וְֽהֶחֱרַ֗שְׁתִּי <WH2790> and I kept silence דִּמִּ֗יתָ <WH1819> thou thoughtest הֱֽיוֹת־ <WH1961> that I was altogether אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> was just כָמ֑וֹךָ <WH3644> like אוֹכִיחֲךָ֖ <WH3198> [such an one] as thyself [but] I will reprove וְאֶֽעֶרְכָ֣ה <WH6186> thee and set [them] in order לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> before thine eyes

בִּֽינוּ־ <WH995> Now consider נָ֣א <WH4994> Now זֹ֭את <WH2063> who שֹׁכְחֵ֣י <WH7911> this ye that forget אֱל֑וֹהַּ <WH433> God פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or אֶ֝טְרֹ֗ף <WH2963> lest I tear [you] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and [there be] none to deliver

זֹבֵ֥חַ <WH2076> Whoso offereth תּוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> praise יְֽכַ֫בְּדָ֥נְנִי <WH3513> glorifieth וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> me and to him that ordereth דֶּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> [his] conversation אַ֝רְאֶ֗נּוּ <WH7200> [aright] will I shew בְּיֵ֣שַׁע <WH3468> the salvation אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God
